description: Bulblins are puuuuurrrdy smart for being so tiny! They know exactrly where to hit the baddies and knock em out for good! We just got to tell em how!
tooltip: Bulblins are puuuuurrrdy smart for being so tiny! They know exactrly where to hit the baddies and knock em out for good! We just got to tell em how! (Bulblin Thugs deal 10% increased damage and double the chance to stun with each attack)
